alert.note: Alert for Anson; Richmond (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with torrential downpours and strong wind gusts will impact portions of southern Anson and Richmond Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rockingham to 7 miles south of Wadesboro. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockingham, Hamlet, Hoffman, Dobbins Heights, Lilesville, Morven, McFarlan, Diggs, East Rockingham and Sandhills Game Land. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall, with locally as much as one to two inches, will also result from these slow-moving storms. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
